text: Egha God siosɨn ingangarim damuasa, faragha aposelbav sefe, egha aposelba gɨn an otivir akabar gun mɨgeir gumazamizibav sefe, egha men gɨn God ifongezir arazibar igharaz darazir sure gamir gumazamizibav sefe. Egha uaghan mirakelbagh amir gumazamiziba ko, gumazir arɨmariabagh amima, da ghuamaziba ko, gumazamizir igharaz darazir akurvaziba ko, siosɨn ingangaribar amuasa gumazamizibav gɨa ingangariba vaghvagh me ganɨdiba ko, Godɨn Duamɨn otivaghirir mɨzebav geir gumazamizibav sefe.
